name: Sailing Wizard
description: We are a group of veteran players with independent game dreams. Since 2011, we have been building Monduz worldview and related games. We have written two dessert games,which are Monduz Battlezone and Monduz CityGuardian. With the help of the mature Unreal 4 engine and the support of more professional companions, we hope to bring you a more expressive game experience and show you the grand Monduz world better.
